story_teamaquamagma_01_02000/2401_1001_0: How long do we gotta lie low like this?

You got Kyogre on our side, so it would be easy
for a guy like you, bro!

So until that’s done, I’ve told Archie that we should
operate carefully.

I know you wanna get rowdy, but I need ya to
wait a little bit more.

And listen, Matt... Destroying Team Magma ain’t
what we should be doing right now.
story_teamaquamagma_01_02000/2401_1001_1:
We should be creating a utopia for Pokémon...
That’s why we need Kyogre’s power!

But I mean, if they try to bother us, I’ve got no
qualms beating ’em down!
Bro’s being...careful? That ain’t like him at all...
Has he changed since he’s come to Pasio?
